name: UE5 Side Scroller Game with 3D Asset
name_original: UE5 Side Scroller Game with 3D Asset
description: This is a side scroller game made in unreal engine 5.  This project have 3 different side scroller level with different task. This is a fully blueprint made project. This project have 5 different map like Level1, Level2, Level3, Menu and overview map.  This project have intro and menu loop video, 20+ blueprint like menu, 3 different, walk, run, death, gun, speed up , kill, drop, ninja blade, enemy canon Ai, save game, save high score, 16 different blueprint etc.  This is also has 100+ 3d model mesh, 4 different texture each of them. You can use those 3D Model anywhere you want. All of that you will get at 9.99$. I will rise the price later so get it soon
